:maxCount.description: The maximum number of avatars displayed

maxPopoverPlacement.description: Extra avatar bubble pop up location
maxPopoverPlacement.description_zh: 多余头像气泡弹出位置

maxPopoverTrigger.description: Set how redundant avatar popovers are triggered
maxPopoverTrigger.description_zh: 设置多余头像 Popover 的触发方式

size.description: Set the size of your avatar
size.type: number | large | small | default | { xs: number, sm: number, ...}
